cause.description:
End taxation without representation. Washington is a capital, not a colony. Let the people vote. Free DC!
1. Residents of the District of Columbia, as full and equal American citizens, have an inalienable right to be represented by fully empowered representatives in the U.S. House of Representatives and the U.S. Senate.
cause.mission: Bring American Democracy to America's Capital
cause.name: FREE DC
